title: Snowdown Mystery Gifting
body:
Hey guys for those who have used the new Mystery Gifting thing,

Can you self mystery gift a Mestery Chest/Snowdown Mystery Box? Or is to only to other people?

replies.body: By the way, Gifting is now 10 and to recieve is now 5

> [{quoted}](name=Xerioum,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZmWJBLXk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-14T04:51:30.791+0000)
> By the way, Gifting is now 10 and to recieve is now 5

Proof? Not being skeptical, just wanna be sure~
I'm not sure if they're going to implement the self-mystery gifting again for a while. They had it a couple of weeks ago?
Smurfs! Smurfs are the answer to everything. Those cute little blue people.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZmWJBLXk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-14T03:21:46.813+0000)
> Smurfs! Smurfs are the answer to everything. Those cute little blue people.

Thats the problem. You need to be above Lvl20 to give and Lvl10 to get. My smurf is Lvl 10 and I want Snow Bunny Nid on my smurf and a Snowdown Mystery Box on my main.

1 - Get $10 RP on smurf, give thyself SB Nid and Snowdown Mystery Box gift my main but wait, my smurf isn't high enough level.
2 - Get $10 RP on main, gift my smurf SB Nid and gift myself Snowdown Mystery Box but wait, can I self mystery gift Snowdown Mystery Box?

{{champion:76}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:76}}
Seriously? You don't have a smurf above 20? That's just sad...

I think you will be able to mystery gift yourself on 16th of December because that's when snowdown starts 

:)
